description:
[Enjoy Novelmates]
Novelmates is your gateway to a romantic world of addictive novels from various genres. Dive into captivating stories, explore new plots on those web novels. With Novelmates, immerse yourself into storytelling anytime, anywhere.

[Features]
1.Extensive Library: Access a diverse library of novels spanning multiple genres, including romance, mystery, fantasy, science fiction, thriller, and more.

2.Personalized Recommendations: Discover new novels tailored to your preferences based on your favorite novels and stories.

3.Bookmarking: Bookmark your favorite novels and never lose your place in a story.

4.Night Mode: Read comfortably in low-light conditions with the night mode feature, reducing eye strain.

5.Seamless Experience: Enjoy a seamless reading experience with smooth page-turning animations and intuitive navigation controls.

6.Subscriptions: Enjoy the unlimited reading experience without interruptions after subscribing, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the story.

[Tranding Novel For You]
- Billionaire
- Werewolf
- Romance
- Badboy
- Mafia


Discover the joy of reading with Novelmates and unlock a world of good novels. Download now and start your literary journey today!

We offer a unique free offline Bible study tool that you can learn and share the Holy Bible on your own or with your trusted bible study group. Comparing to traditional Holy Bible, our e-bible allows you to access Holy Bible easily on your digital devices without carrying paper book around, listen to Bible verses while driving and running, or take challenges of biblical quizzes and crosswords. 

Our KJV Bible App is a Fast, light, free offline bible for your daily study. It allows you to quickly locate Holy Bible verse with a simple tap and create your own Holy Bible verse highlights, bookmark and verse picture.

Please join our virtual bible study group to explore Bible with more than 10 million people who have downloaded our KJV Holy Bible App worldwide. Get yourself closer to God and listen to God's word at any time by using our pocket Holy Bible App.

----Feature ----

BEST AUDIO FOR BIBLE PLAN
-Various Bible verse audio of King James Version KJV.
-Classic bible plan audio that you can listen to God's word.
-Listen to your favorite Bible verses whenever you are unable to read while driving, running and strolling.
-Let God's word put you to sleep at night.

THE BEST BIBLE STUDY TOOL
-Access to Holy Bible anytime anywhere just by swiping screen.
-Offline Bibles: Read and study Bible verse WITHOUT internet access.
-Search the Bible with keywords.
-Quickly locate verse.
-Share your Bible verse with your friends anytime anywhere with ease.
-Highlight verses you like for future bible study.
-Note your inspirations.
-Have fun with our selected bible quizzes and crosswords challenges.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR FREE BIBLE
-Font adjustment: choose any font size and line spacings you want.
-Night mode: change to night mode when you read the Bible at night.
-Share verses with your friends via social platforms with ease.
-Verses Image: Customize fantastic Bible verse images.

READ BIBLE DAILY
-Connect to God's word with our one-of-a-kind pocket Holy Bible App.
-Fantastic Bible reading experience.
-Use this free Bible for your daily devotional study and Christian Bible reading.
-Read with your religious community and share your thoughts together.

To have access to the Ad-Free Version, you can choose a monthly remove ads subscription. This recurring transaction will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of your subscription. Renewals will be charged the same cost within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

developer: SOFTCRAFT SYSTEMS AND SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
description:
We are extremely proud and happy to release The Holy Bible (King James Version) - for iPhone completely offline loaded with user friendly features. The app contains both "Old Testament" and "New Testament" in English language. We sincerely hope that this app will rejoice you and will be more useful in reading the Bible.

* We offer an entirely unique offline Bible study experience that can assist learn and share the Holy Bible verses to your family or friends groups. Compared to the traditional Holy Bible, our e-bible allows you to access The Bible easily on your phone without carrying the Bible, and listen to audio Bible verses while driving and running.

* Our Holy Bible App is an easy, light, offline bible for your daily Bible studies. To enhance your Bible App experience, the app allows you to quickly locate Holy Bible verses with quick options and create your own Holy Bible verse highlights, bookmarks, verse images, and notes. Explore the Holy Bible with your closest friends and family. 

-- FEATURES --

THE BEST AND EASY BIBLE APP

-Access to the Old Testament and New Testament anytime & anywhere.
-Offline: Read and study Bible verses without internet access.
-Search Holy Bible with keywords.
-Search with voice to search fast.
-Quickly locate the verses through our traditional search option.
-Share Bible verses with beloved ones in text format, image (photo) format.
-Design your own share images with multiple photo backgrounds and text edit options.
-Highlight with colour, Bookmark, underline, bold verses you like for future Bible reference.
-Add Notes to verses.

BEST AUDIO BIBLE

-Enjoy your Bible study by playing the Audio Bible.
-Easy navigation options to read the next verse or chapter.
-Create your own Audio Bible "PLAYLISTS" and listen to your favorite Bible verses whenever you are unable to read while driving, running, etc.
-Have a good sleep with God's word playing at night.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR BIBLE APP

-Font setting: choose any font size you want in order to get the most suitable Bible reading experiences.
-Night mode: you can change to night mode when you read the Bible at night or whenever needed.
-Share The Bible verses with your friends and family on social media with ease.
-Wallpapers: use our gallery images to customise your phone backgrounds.

DAILY BIBLE AND READING PLANS

-Get daily verse as notification to your phone in the morning. The time can be customized to your needs.
-Use our reading plans to study The Bible and lead religious life.
-Daily verse menu to refer to the daily verses.
-Menus to refer to the highlighted, bookmarked verses.

With your support, we will keep on upgrading and updating the app to make it the best Bible to read The Holy Bible.

Thank You,
Softcraft Systems,
www.bible2all.com
www.softcraftsystems.com

Report errors to support@softcraftsystems.com.

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Wattpad Premium:
- Subscribe to Wattpad Premium for uninterrupted ads-free reading and first access to new features
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of the chosen package
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- For full terms of service, visit https://www.wattpad.com/terms
- For our privacy policy, visit https://www.wattpad.com/privacy
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Already a Wattpad fan? Follow us on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests, and more!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wattpad/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wattpad
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wattpad/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wattpad

description:

Start reading your favorite book, by downloading the GoodNovel app！

- No.1 Book Reading Platform for Novel Lovers

- Hundreds of web novel Read More Than 1,000,000+ Times
- Professional Author Team Creates Best Novel

Book Genres
GoodNovel contains many web novel genres,  from urban books to supernatural books, and is deeply loved by the majority of our readers.

So many book genres await you to explore on GoodNovel App.

GoodNovel has hundreds of books that have been read more than 1 million times, and you can read these novels as much as you want without having to buy the paperback edition!

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodNovel Bundle to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a Kindle with the free Kindle app, and carry all your eBooks with you, wherever you go.

eBooks (including those with narration) that you have purchased on Amazon will automatically appear in your app.  Kindle Unlimited and Amazon Prime members can select and download eBooks directly in the app.
 
What you’ll get:
• Sample any eBook for free
• Magazines, newspapers, graphic novels and textbooks with high-res colour images
• A customisable reading experience with your choice of font style, size and more
• Comfortable reading day and night with adjustable screen brightness and page colour
• Discover and download Kindle Unlimited eBooks and magazines
• Unique features like X-Ray, Whispersync, Page Flip, Print Replica, flashcards and more
• Instant translations and definitions, without leaving the page
• Ability to make and share in-page highlights
• Bold font and text size options
• Access to local library eBooks

By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use (www.amazon.co.uk/conditionsofuse). Please see our Privacy Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/privacynotice), our Cookies Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/cookies) and our Interest-Based Ads Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/interestbasedads).

DISCOVER THE BIBLE 

* Easily select from lots of Bible versions
* Offline Bibles: Read without network access

STUDY THE BIBLE

* Search the Bible using keywords
* Simple to use interfaces


Download and enjoy the BIBLE experience

Discover the "Holy Bible" App - Your Gateway to Spiritual Growth
Embark on a transformative faith journey with the "Holy Bible" app, a powerful companion designed to uplift and inspire. Immerse yourself in endless possibilities as you explore captivating features to enhance your spiritual experience. From engaging Bible study sessions to enlightening conversations with an AI priest, from exhilarating trivia quizzes to serene moments of prayer, "Holy Bible" is the ultimate app for every devout believer.
Unlock the Power of Prayer
Experience a profound connection with the divine through the app's immersive prayer platform. Engage in morning and night prayers with carefully curated verses and uplifting prayers that resonate with your heart's desires. Connect with God anytime, anywhere, and express your thoughts and aspirations.
Elevate Your Bible Reading
Immerse yourself in the wisdom of the Bible with the personalized reading experience. Tailor your journey to suit your preferences by creating notes, highlights, and bookmarks. Whether you're at the gym or enjoying a moment of tranquility, listen to Bible audios to enrich your understanding. With offline access, delve into scriptures without relying on a network connection.
Enlightenment With AI Priest
Engage with your AI priest through the app. Seamlessly blend technology with spirituality as you receive invaluable guidance and answers to your deepest questions. This feature facilitates Bible study and supports clarity on your spiritual path.
Ignite Your Mind with Bible Quiz
Stimulate your intellect and relax your soul with Bible trivia quizzes. Whether you seek a momentary escape or a brain-teasing challenge, the app offers an array of quizzes to test your knowledge while providing a well-deserved respite. Unwind, recharge, and deepen your connection to the Word in an interactive way.
Embrace Guided Study Plans
Cultivate a consistent study and prayer routine with the comprehensive plans. Choose from themed study plans for personal growth. Receive reminders and notifications to nourish your soul with divine wisdom.
Immerse Yourself in Bible Jigsaw
Experience the beauty of churches around the world through captivating Bible quiz games and activities. Collect jigsaw pieces, unlocking stunning views of churches. Let the splendor of these images further enrich your spiritual exploration.
Record Your Journey With God
Capture the essence of your spiritual odyssey using the app. Document your interactions with God, cherishing every moment spent seeking His heart and communicating through prayer. Witness the transformative power of devotion.
Key Features:
- Personalize prayer experience and communicate directly with God.
- Engage in insightful conversations with your AI priest, exploring biblical knowledge.
- Test your learning and deepen understanding with engaging Bible quizzes.
- Foster a commitment to study and personal growth with supportive features.
- Share impactful verses with friends and loved ones effortlessly.
- Create visually stunning scripture-sharing images.
- Develop a daily habit of study and prayer through the habit-forming function.
- Immerse yourself in personalized reading experiences, choosing fonts, backgrounds, and generating personalized notes.
- Experience the Bible come to life with the audio version, perfect for moments of relaxation or exercise.
- Embark on theme-based study plans, deepening understanding.
- Track your spiritual growth, celebrating progress.

Download My Books and enjoy all books and audiobooks anytime you want. My Books has over 50k books that you can read with no limitations and with absolutely no cost. If you also like to listen to audiobooks there is a very low monthly subscription fee. The app also has a very fresh and modern app design that makes reading very enjoyable and comfortable for your eyes. Discover classic gems such as Ulysses, or all-time favorites such as the
Adventure of Sherlock Holmes. You will also find fairy tales, fantasy books, science fiction, mythology, poetry, and many more. There is also a section featuring banned books - books that are banned at some point in history because of their controversial content. Listen to audiobooks when you don’t feel like reading by still want to enjoy the great classic story telling.

Where do you go when you want to find some good reads? Do you go to your public library? Purchase ebooks online and download them to your ebook readers? Or buy audible books to listen to?

Now you can conveniently access over 50k books in My Books app. We cover many genres: adventure, romance, mystery and crime such as Sherlock Holmes, ancient Greek literature such as the Ulysses, and so much more! You can also read History, writings by US Presidents and much more. Expand your mind and try to read some books that people deem
controversial in Banned Books section. There are also books that will help you improve your English skills. It’s even better if you read and listen to it at the same time.

=== Why you should get My Books: ===

● Enjoy one of the largest collections of free eBooks in Appstore: There are more than 50,000 eBooks to read. These are timeless classics, epic novels, fantasy books, thriller books, fairy tales and romance novels.
● Featured Content: We deliver fresh content and reading recommendation
to you everyday. Try our recommendations when you don’t know what else to read.
● Audiobooks: Tired or reading? Just listen to it! Browse through our audio books section and start enjoying the stories while doing something else. Improve your English by listening and reading at the same time.
● New App Design: We’ve just created a new design for you! It looks fresh, clean, and very user friendly. There are also new features and new books added to make reading a lot more comfortable.

=== FEATURES OF MY BOOKS: ===

- Clean, modern, user friendly interface
- Don’t know what to read? Try our recommendations!
- Discover classic gems such as Ulysses from our Ancient Literature section.
- Get inspired with Quotes of the day by classic novelists and authors.
- Listen to our audiobooks.
- Browse some good books to read by choosing Authors or Categories
- Use Search function to look for a specific title.
- Save favorite books to My Library

My Books is the best place to find good reads that you can access anytime, anywhere.
Download it today and start reading!

---

My Books app is free to download & use. To keep our app going, we need your help! Please take a minute to visit our Appstore page to give us a great feedback in the form of rating or review, which will help boost our app and let other people discover it. You can also help by sharing our free eBook app with your friends and family.

Meloshort: Your Ultimate Destination for Popular Short Dramas and Must-Watch Mini-Series

In today’s fast-paced world, finding time to unwind and enjoy quality entertainment can be a challenge. That’s where Meloshort comes in — the ultimate app designed specifically for busy viewers like you, who crave engaging stories but have limited time. With episodes lasting just 1 to 2 minutes, Meloshort offers a vast and diverse library of popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series that perfectly fit into your fragmented schedule.
Whether you are commuting, grabbing a quick coffee break, or just squeezing in some entertainment between daily tasks, Meloshort lets you dive into cinematic-quality storytelling anytime, anywhere. Experience the grandeur of ancient costume dramas, the sweetness and charm of modern romances, the thrill of intense boss hero stories, or the gripping suspense of revenge thrillers — all in beautifully produced HD formats that bring these worlds to life on your screen.

Diverse Genres to Match Every Mood
Our ever-expanding collection covers a rich variety of genres, ensuring there is something for everyone:
- Sweet Pet Romance: Heartwarming stories filled with adorable love and tender moments.
- Emotional Sadomasochistic Passion: Complex, intense relationships full of raw emotion and drama.
- Thrilling Suspense Mysteries: Edge-of-your-seat narratives packed with twists and turns.
- Heartfelt Campus Stories: Relatable tales of youth, friendship, and first love.
- Urban Emotional Dramas: Deeply engaging stories that explore the complexities of modern city life.
With new episodes and series added every week, your watchlist will never run dry. Our smart recommendation engine learns your tastes and suggests fresh content tailored just for you, helping you discover your next favorite popular short drama or must-watch mini-series effortlessly.

Features Tailored for Your Viewing Pleasure
Meloshort isn’t just about great stories — it’s about making your viewing experience smooth, personalized, and enjoyable. Some of our key features include:
- Playback Speed Control: Adjust episode speed to match your viewing pace — slow down to savor moments or speed up when you’re short on time.
- Personal Watchlist: Easily organize and keep track of all the mini-series you want to watch.
- User-Friendly Interface: Navigate effortlessly through a sleek, intuitive design with stunning HD visuals that make every episode a pleasure to watch.

Global Appeal and Accessibility
Recognizing the global audience we serve, Meloshort supports:
- Multilingual Subtitles: Catering to viewers worldwide by providing subtitles in multiple languages.
- Localized Dubbing: Enjoy your favorite dramas in your native language with high-quality dubbing options.
From palace intrigues and CEO romances to campus crushes and emotional urban tales, Meloshort delivers a rich tapestry of stories that resonate across cultures and geographies.

Why Choose Meloshort?
- Optimized for Busy Lives: Episodes last just 1-2 minutes, perfect for watching on the go or during short breaks.
- High-Quality Content: Each drama is carefully selected or produced with cinematic quality, offering you an immersive viewing experience.
- Constantly Updated Library: Fresh content added weekly keeps the excitement alive and your watchlist full.
- Smart Recommendations: Our intelligent algorithm helps you find exactly the kinds of shows you’ll love.

Download Meloshort Today!
Join millions of viewers worldwide who have made Meloshort their go-to app for bite-sized entertainment. Experience fast, high-quality storytelling designed perfectly for your busy lifestyle. Download Meloshort now, start exploring the hottest popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series, and never miss a moment of great storytelling again!

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/meloshort/home/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://sites.google.com/view/meloshort/home/terms-of-use

Instaread offers two subscription options: Monthly subscription for $8.99/month (with first week FREE) and a Yearly subscription for $89.99/year (with first week FREE). Cancel subscription anytime. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period by going to your iOS Account Settings after purchase. The privacy policy can be viewed at instaread.co/privacy. The terms of use can be viewed at instaread.co/terms.

Relax and dive into a great story! Enjoy our bestselling series! Millions of readers can’t get enough of our library of unputdownable novels. Dive into an extensive collection of audiobooks, ebook novels, and immersive fiction stories. New chapters and interactive stories are added every day.

BINGE-READ / SNACK-READ
* Unstoppable addictive stories span multiple seasons, and new chapters released daily!
* 15 minutes per chapter, read at your own pace, whenever wherever you are, any time you want.

A LIBRARY FOR EVERY DESIRE
* Fall in love with our epic novels and unlimited fiction series.

* Follow your favorite books and writers as we craft a never-ending story.

A REVOLUTIONARY READING EXPERIENCE
* More immersive, interactive, and engaging than a traditional book.
* Turn on/off music, ambiance, and sound effects.

* Offline reading anytime, anywhere.

STORIES IN BOTH BOOK/AUDIOBOOK FORMATS

The NKJV app teaches us the parables of Jesus Christ, focusing on love, compassion, and forgiveness. It includes an audio Bible option for those who have difficulty reading. The Bible is available in different formats like the NKJV study Bible, NKJV printed books, and a version designed for kids.

Bible for Women is a beautifully designed, free mobile application, conceived with the single purpose to inspire and nurture the faith of women across the globe. Rooted in the teachings of the Holy Bible, this app brings the sacred scriptures of the Bible to life in a way that is practical, user-friendly, and easily accessible.

Whether you are in the cozy comfort of your home or managing the challenges of the outside world, our Bible app ensures that spiritual nourishment from the Bible is always at your fingertips. It offers a plethora of empowering tools that cater to the unique spiritual needs and experiences of women who seek guidance from the Bible. Our aim is to support women on their journey towards a deeper relationship with God through the Bible and to fortify their spiritual connections.

Our range of Bible-related features is just as varied as it is extensive:

- Start your day with thoughtfully chosen, inspirational Bible verses that echo the wisdom and spiritual insight typical of women. These Bible verses are handpicked from the Bible to inspire, motivate, and invigorate you, setting a positive tone for your day with the Bible.
- Receive daily reminders for prayers and meditation guides, crafted with the intention to enrich your soul with the teachings of the Bible. These guides offer a structured route for your daily spiritual journey with the Bible, helping you remain focused and connected to God.
- Our Bible Audio feature allows you to soak in scripture readings from the Bible, making it a perfect companion for the modern, busy woman. Whether you're commuting, exercising, or simply unwinding, this Bible feature lets you absorb the teachings of the Bible.
- The Bible app lets you make personal notes and highlight verses from the Bible that touch your heart. This interactive aspect turns your spiritual journey into a deeply personal experience, enabling you to contemplate, internalize, and document your thoughts and feelings about the Bible.
- For those who enjoy a little challenge, our Bible app includes engaging Bible quizzes designed to test and enhance your knowledge of the Bible. These quizzes add a touch of fun while also fostering a better understanding and recall of biblical teachings.

Bible for Women is more than just an app - it's a spiritual partner that effortlessly integrates the solace of the Holy Bible into your daily routine. It ensures that the wisdom of the Holy Bible is always available to you, even in offline mode. Every single feature is thoughtfully crafted to meet you where you are, empowering, supporting, and guiding you on your faith journey with the Bible.

This Bible app creates a direct and uncomplicated path to spiritual nourishment for every woman seeking a deeper bond with God through the Bible. Experience the transformative power of scripture, tailored exclusively for women, with Bible for Women. Download the Bible app today to unlock the sacred wisdom of the Bible and embark on a journey of self-discovery. Explore a world of biblical insight designed just for you, and let the Bible lead you towards a richer, more fulfilling spiritual life.

The Die Bybel app is an E-Bible application that can be used by Afrikaan Christians around any part of the world.

The Die Bybel app teaches us the parables of Jesus Christ, which emphasize love, compassion, and forgiveness.

There are several different translations of the bible, like Die Ou Vertaling, Die Nuwe Vertaling, Die Bybel 1983 vertaling, but Die Bybel Afrikaans is famous among Afrikaan speaking Christians.

The Die Bybel app can be read by all age groups. The Bible verses are translated in the most simple form, yet it gives an accurate meaning. It can be used for both self-study and public reading.

The app contains both reading and listening options, the Bible verses are available in Afrikaan as well as the Afrikaan audio Bible.

Die bybel is available in many forms, such as Die bybel Holy printed books, Die bybel digital editions, Die bybel audio Bible, Die bybel for kids, and Die bybel Holy Bible.


Features:

	•	DAILY VERSE - Once you set the reminder, you will receive day-to-day notifications to read your daily Bible verses.

	•	MY LIBRARY - It is like the personal space of the user, as it contains all the highlighted verses and notes you make from reading the Bible. You can also bookmark the verses that you love.

	•	It includes both the OLD and NEW TESTAMENTS.

	•	AUDIO BIBLE - Listen to the words of the lord in audio format.

	•	SOCIAL MEDIA POST  - Bible verses with images are available; you can choose your favourite verse and share it with your friends and family on social media.

	•	WALLPAPERS - Many beautiful varieties are available, and you can download anything for free.

	•	VIDEOS - It has animated Biblical videos on so many topics, such as Jesus, Sad, Hope, Blessings, Alone, Wisdom, Motivation, Gratitude, Blessings, God’s Promises, forgiveness, healing, and considerably more.

	•	MIRACLE PRAYER - It has many different prayers according to all our wants, for example, morning prayer, bedtime prayer for healing, and much more.

	•	BIBLE STORIES - Bible stories for kids are available in a separate folder.

	•	Festive Calendar - It displays all the Christian festive days.

ReadEra - a book reader, allows you to read books for free, text to voice and listen to books for free, offline, in the PDF, EPUB, DOC, DOCX, RTF, MOBI, AZW3, CBZ, CBR, DJVU, FB2, TXT, ODT and CHM formats.

No ads
Read books and listen to books without ads. The ReadEra app for reading books and viewing PDF documents neither contains ads nor imposes internal purchases.

No registration
We’ve made a fast, reliable reader that doesn't compel users to use any specific services. The book reader works offline and is entirely free. Read books for free and listen to books for free (TTS), without limits!

Text to Speech (TTS) 
Read text aloud with voice (TTS) – allows you to read text aloud and listen to all your books, PDF files and documents for free. With the Text to Speech (TTS) function, all your books and documents turn into audiobooks at the tap of the "Read aloud" button. TTS turns your book library into a personal audio library, making reading more flexible and enjoyable. This is especially useful for those who prefer the audio format or want to listen to books in situations where reading is impossible.
You can read foreign books and at the same time listen to the pronunciation of words and sentences. You can choose a voice, adjust the speech speed, turn on repeating text to voice of the selected text, word or sentence. 
Listen to books and documents with ReadEra while doing your things – on the go, working out, before bed and even when sleeping.

Read books of all formats
ReadEra is a set of reading apps in one app, which reads well multiple types of formats: book Epub, Kindle (MOBI, AZW3), Fb2; business PDF, Djvu; office Microsoft Word (DOC, DOCX, RTF), ODT; text TXT and others. Reading books, viewing Microsoft Word documents and PDF files from zip archives.
The reader for books, ReadEra, reads all popular formats of books, journals, articles and other documents in one app.

Best book manager for your library
Auto-detection of books and documents. Grouping books into lists: To Read, Have Read, Favorites. Sorting by name, file format, the last time read, etc. Quickly search for books, PDF files and documents in your library.

Navigation through a book
Quick access to reading settings, table of contents, your bookmarks, quotes, notes and other eBook options. Navigate through the book using the page index or the progress bar line.

Convenient reading settings
Auto-saving the current reading page. Comfortable color themes when reading books: day, night, sepia, console. Horizontal or vertical page flipping mode. Brightness and page margins adjustment, including PDF and DjVu. Separate settings for text and graphic formats. Adjustable type font, size, boldness, line spacing and hyphenation for Microsoft Word, Epub, Kindle (Mobi, Azw3), Fb2, TXT and ODT. Zoom in option for reading PDF and Djvu files.

Quotes and Notes
Create quotes and add notes to text. Highlight text in books, PDF files and documents, add personal notes to the highlighted text. A well-thought-out and simple algorithm for working with quotes and notes. All your quotes and notes in a book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the “About Document” section.

Bookmarks
Add bookmarks to save your favorite spots in books with a single tap. Just tap the upper-right corner while reading to quickly add a bookmark. All bookmarks for the book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the "About Document" section.

Text Translation
ReadEra supports integration with the iOS system “Translate” app for seamless text translation. Instantly translate text in books, PDFs, and documents using the built-in translator on your device.

Read books and Listen to books easily and for free with ReadEra!

We have enhanced our digital editions (where possible) to bring the content to life by embedding animations, video and interactive tools to help illustrate the key points and skills from our popular books. Download this free app to browse the eBook editions – you can also try free taster versions of many eBooks, so you can try before you buy.

These eBooks are a great resource supporting our world famous RYA Training Courses such as those within the trademark RYA Yachtmaster Scheme, the RYA Powerboat Scheme and the RYA Dinghy Sailing & Windsurfing Schemes among others. You will find eBooks of essential and recommended titles along with plenty of further reading and development, whether you’re starting to sail by taking a Competent Crew course, taking things further with a Day Skipper course or taking your RYA Yachtmaster exam – whatever you need, we’ve got it covered!

There are great examples throughout our range of our use of interactive content in areas such as seamanship, boat handling, passage planning, knots and stability but you’ll find something very special in our editions for:
• Collision Regulations – where we've developed over twenty interactive 360° lights and shapes tool to provide readers a more realistic way of viewing how vessels will actually present themselves in a wide variety of contexts, at four different times of day covering both day and night.
• VHF – where we’ve created animated examples of the voice procedures in the RYA VHF Handbook and also linked the content to sample questions to help students pass the RYA SRC exam.
• Navigation – where we’ve developed a special tool to replicate using the tidal curves in the RYA Training Almanacs to help students taking shorebased navigation courses.

Although these eBooks are designed for tablets, we’re still keeping smart phones very much in mind. This way, you’ll still be able to access the enhanced interactive content on the smaller devices even if you feel you wouldn't read a book on something so small.

There’s plenty for instructors as well with not only the interactive content, that can be used as demonstrations and enhanced learning on and off the water. There are also a whole host of useful features, (which we’re always evolving) such as bookmarking, note taking and inter-edition linking that will help you manage the content you want to support the way you teach.

This updated version of the app now includes a wider range of boating categories to make it easier for you to navigate all the new content that we are regularly adding:
• Sail
• Dinghy
• Sail Racing
• Sail Cruising
• Windsurfing
• Power
• Powerboating
• Motor Cruising
• Personal Watercraft
• Inland Waterways
